Keeping your customers satisfied is more of a survival strategy in Schedule 1 than a goal. The use of appropriate mixing formulae for the best Strains is crucial. Players are not allowed to become very comfortable in this drug simulator because when they do, their clients will become irate, which will cause the cash deposits to decrease even faster.Knowing how to combine ingredients in the right way for making the best strains to maximize profit is the secret formula. The stakes increase as you move closer to the mid- to endgame. Fortunately, the secret recipes of the best strains in the game which you'll need are included in this guide.Here are the best strains and their ingredients:~$185 (negotiable up to $200+)The ‚ÄúOG‚Äù in the name of the strain truly stands out for it as it is the very first ever strain mix in the game we got to unlock. Your NPCs love it and it‚Äôs a good salad scaling early-game because of its low-ingredient cost and decent margins.Furthermore, this blend could serve as an escaping tool in case players find things going south. While players might question whether other could have become the game's top earners since the patch, such as Green Crack, the general consensus is that OG Kush is still the best strain in schedule one. This strain gives the consumers anti-gravity and glowing effects.$165 base, up to $200 with negotiationsThis strain has a 100% Addiction rating, making it among the highest rated in the game. The downside is that the right ingredients take grinding before you can sell it. However, until you get there, once you start selling, the NPC gets addicted quickly and you get to reap the benefits.~$160Though not as strong as the Green Crack-based strains, it‚Äôs still a good mid-game option. The consistent customer demand provides a secure source of income, and it can be a substitute for the premium-grade ingredients if you‚Äôre running low.$140‚Äì$160 per unitThis strain is a reliable option‚Äînot the most eye-catching or the most costly, but it provides consistent sales at little cost of concern. If micromanaging supply isn't in your scope, Gorilla Strain is your option.
Article Summary: Og kush (sweet fruit) is still the best strain in schedule one. Gorilla strain is your option if micromanaging supply isn't in your scope. Max fruit (granddaddy perp) provides consistent sales at little cost of concern.

Article Title: Vladimir Guerrero Jr.‚Äôs dream of a $500 million contract suffers a setback
Article Text:
Vladimir Guerrero Jr.‚Äôs dream of a $500 million contract suffers a setback (Image Source: Getty)

Contract negotiations between Vladimir Guerrero and the Blue Jays

Ramifications of the flopped negotiations

Toronto Blue Jays' ace first baseman Vladimir Guerrero Jr. has been making headlines after his chase for a fat contract. Known for his stellar on-field performance, Vladimir Guerrero is looking for a deal that reflects his importance to the team. The latest newcomer has revealed that his $500 million contract deal has run into some problems.The Blue Jays and Vladimir Guerrero's negotiations are still on, with the two sides declaring they are keen to agree on a mutually profitable contract. Despite Vladimir Guerrero stating that he needs a long-term contract, the negotiations have been tough. Vladimir Guerrero was quoted as wanting a contract equivalent to Juan Soto's 15-year deal but no more than $600 million. However, the Blue Jays have been reluctant to agree to these terms, and this has created a big void between the two teams.Meanwhile, Vladimir Guerrero and the Blue Jays agreed to a one-year, $28.5 million arbitration deal to settle his arbitration case for the 2025 season. The deal puts Vladimir Guerrero at the highest salary earned by an arbitration-eligible player in MLB history. But the reason Vladimir Guerrero's contract is not being extended is that he becomes a free agent after the 2025 season, and that puts pressure on negotiations.This historic arbitration deal reflects Vladimir Guerrero's immense value to the team and the expectations tied to his performance in the upcoming season. However, it also raises questions about the Blue Jays‚Äô long-term plans and whether they‚Äôre willing to meet the financial demands and expectations required to retain a superstar of his caliber. With free agency looming, every game in 2025 will not only influence Guerrero‚Äôs market value but also determine if Toronto can remain his baseball home beyond this pivotal season.Not being able to sign Vladimir Guerrero to a long-term contract has some implications for Vladimir Guerrero and the Blue Jays. For Vladimir Guerrero, not having an extension while approaching free agency is both a plus and a minus. While he may be pursued by other clubs interested in signing him with huge contracts, there is uncertainty regarding his next move. His suitors included the New York Yankees, New York Mets, and Boston Red Sox, who made their names featured on news headlines following the remarkable work by Vladimir Guerrero.As the season in 2025 approaches, Vladimir Guerrero and the Blue Jays will be under some difficult choices on these issues. Vladimir Guerrero's on-field play will influence his value to the marketplace, and the Blue Jays will have to consider the benefits of holding onto their best asset versus the financial expense that accompanies it. The outcome of these talks will be watched carefully by fans and analysts alike because it can make or break Vladimir Guerrero's career and the destiny of the Blue Jays.Ultimately, the decision is for the management of the Blue Jays to make. They have to decide whether they see Vladimir Guerrero Jr. as a long-term cornerstone of their franchise or if they are willing to risk losing him to a rival team. With his talent and marketability, Guerrero‚Äôs future contract will be one of the biggest storylines in MLB history, shaping not only his career but also the competitive landscape of the entire league.Also Read: Vladimir Guerrero Jr. Net Worth 2025: Salary, Contract, Charity, Personal Life, And More
Article Summary: Toronto blue jays' ace first baseman vladimir guerrero jr. has revealed that his $500 million contract deal has run into some problems. The blue jays and vladimir guerrero's negotiations are still on, with the two sides declaring they are keen to agree on a mutually profitable contract.

Article Title: All Schedule 1 suppliers and how to unlock them
Article Text:
Image via TVGS.

All the suppliers in Schedule 1

Albert Hoover ‚Äì The King of Weed, and his specialty is marijuana seeds.

‚Äì The King of Weed, and his specialty is marijuana seeds. Shirley Watts ‚Äì Your choice for Pseudo, the base material for Meth.

‚Äì Your choice for Pseudo, the base material for Meth. Salvador Moreno ‚Äì The supplier for Cocaine and Coca Seeds.

How to unlock Albert Hoover

Location: Northtown, behind Dan‚Äôs Hardware.

Products: Marijuana seeds (OG Kush initially, more variants unlock later).

Debt Management: If you owe Albert more than $300, he will want you to pay that back fairly quickly. Be sure to have your finances in order.

How to unlock Shirley Watts

Location: Westville.

Products: Pseudo (initially low-quality variant, with two additional higher-quality variants available later)

Unlock Requirements: Become friendly with either Jerry Montero or Meg Cooley.

Debt Management: Pay off the debts at the Warehouse.

How to unlock Salvador Moreno

Location: The Docks, outskirts of the map.

Products: Coca seeds.

Unlock Requirements: Become friends with either Mac Cooper or Javier Perez.

Debt Management: Repay debts behind the Church.

If you're hoping to thrive in the drug business in TVGS's viral Breaking Bad-ish indie game, you have to have an active supply chain. The Schedule 1 suppliers provide the raw materials you need to build an empire, and access to them will be the first step to success. We'll introduce you to the three suppliers, where to find them, and how to get access, in this guide.(The information mentioned in this article has been taken from destructoid Schedule 1 features three suppliers at launch, each providing the primary ingredients for their respective instrumental drug productions:You must visit various regions and develop relationships with different personas and provide specific requirements to unlock them. Here‚Äôs an overview of how to access each supplier.Albert Hoover is the easiest supplier to access since he‚Äôs available from the beginning. He specializes in marijuana and provides four types of weed seeds, even if you only have access to OG Kush to begin with, then you'll unlock the other strains as you progress further.Shirley Watts will become your first supplier of Pseudo, the main ingredient for Meth. She becomes available fairly early in the game when you first arrive in Westville, the second region.Salvador Moreno is the last and most difficult supplier to get unlocked. Salvador is located in the Docks, the fourth region of the map, and supplies Coca seeds, which are required for Cocaine production. Unlike Weed or Meth, Coca seeds only have a single version, but you can improve the quality of the product by drying the leaves.
Article Summary: Schedule 1 features three suppliers at launch, each providing the primary ingredients for their respective instrumental drug productions. Albert hoover is the easiest supplier to access since he‚Äôs available from the beginning. Shirley watts will become your first supplier of pseudo, the main ingredient for meth.

Article Title: WWE superstars Liv Morgan and Dominik Mysterio dazzle the Netflix promotional event in traditional Indian attire
Article Text:
(Image Via X/@NetflixIndia)

Liv Morgan and Dominik Mysterio were spotted in the streets of Mumbai in traditional Indian attire

Triple H Has a BIG Announcement for WWE Fans üî• | Netflix India

Also Read

WWE superstars Liv Morgan and Dominik Mysterio have taken the streets of Mumbai by storm after they dazzled at the Netflix promotional event in traditional Indian attire. The WWE stars have visited India for the promotional campaign of WWE‚Äôs latest partnership with the OTT platform Netflix, which started from April this year.The on-screen couple of the company was spotted wearing Indian traditional wear. Liv Morgan was seen gracing the street in a beautiful saree, while Dominik Mysterio donned a green kurta set amidst the bustling streets of Mumbai.Following WWE‚Äôs global transition to Netflix, WWE shows and all their premium live events will now be exclusively available on Netflix in India too from April 1, 2025. For the launch of this event, Liv Morgan and Dominik Mysterio visited Mumbai, India for the promotions.WWE superstars Liv Morgan and Dominik Mysterio were spotted in the city of Mumbai, embracing traditional Indian attire. The duo, known for their high-octane performance and on-screen chemistry, surprised the fans by stepping out in the busy streets of Mumbai in ethnic attire, seamlessly blending with the socio-cultural fabric of India.Netflix India has recently posted the duo‚Äôs picture on their X handle with a caption written as, ‚ÄúRolling into India #WWEOnNetflix. Watch WWE, only on Netflix!‚Äù In the picture, Liv Morgan looked stunningly beautiful while Dominik Mysterio looked very dapper in his new Indian appearance.Previously, WWE CCO Paul "Triple H" Levesque announced that all WWE shows, such as RAW, SmackDown, NXT, and other Premium Live Events, will be available to Indian fans now on Netflix starting April 1st, 2025, ending their long-term network with Sony Sports Network.The official press release stated, "Beginning April 1, 2025, Netflix will become the exclusive new home for WWE in India . As part of Netflix‚Äôs long-term partnership with the sports entertainment company, Indian fans will be able to stream all of WWE‚Äôs weekly flagship shows ‚Äî Raw, NXT, and SmackDown ‚Äî as well as WWE‚Äôs Premium Live Events including SummerSlam, Money in the Bank, Royal Rumble, and the upcoming WrestleMania."As per reports, WWE's partnership with Netflix will allow Indian fans access to all WWE-related content 52 weeks a year, with Hindi commentary available for its televised shows. Besides, it will also include new and exclusive archival content from the WWE vault, which can be streamed live or on demand.Apart from this, WWE President Nick Khan has recently revealed to develop WWE‚Äôs footprint in India in the year 2026-2027. The company‚Äôs president has announced that he is planning to host a major premium live event (PLE) in India very soon due to its high viewership and fan base after the USA.
Article Summary: Wwe superstars liv morgan and dominik mysterio were spotted in the city of mumbai, embracing traditional indian attire. The wwe stars have visited india for the promotional campaign of wwe‚Äôs latest partnership with the ott platform netflix. Wwe shows and all their premium live events will now be exclusively available on netflix in india from april 1, 2025.

Article Title: New York Times Connections hints release: Check clues and answers for #663 April 4, 2025New York Times Connections hints release: Check clues and answers for #663 April 4, 2025
Article Text:
NYT Connections Puzzle April 4 2025 ‚Äì Daily Word Challenge, Hints, and Answers

What is NYT‚Äôs ‚ÄòConnections‚Äô game

NYT Connections hints for April 4, 2025

Yellow: Where greatness swings.

Green: Cruising the open road.

Blue: What‚Äôs left behind.

Purple: Brands with a missing leading vowel.

NYT Connections answers April 4, 2025

Yellow- BALANCE, DIFFERENCE, REMAINDER, REST

Green- CRUISE, DRIVE, RIDE, SPIN

Blue- DIAMOND, FIELD, PARK, STADIUM

Purple- BAY, HARMONY, INK, TRADE

How to play NYT Connections

You will receive a grid of 16 words.

Your goal is to sort these words into four groups of four based on their hidden connections.

Connections may include: Synonyms or antonyms.

Shared themes, such as objects, professions, or word families.

Wordplay or shared prefixes/suffixes.

A new puzzle is released daily at midnight.

You can play the puzzle on the New York Times website or app.

Look at the grid and identify words that seem related.

Experiment with grouping words that share a logical connection, such as names of mythical characters, clickable items, or objects used in a specific context.

Select four words you think belong together.

Click the "Submit" button to test your group.

If your group is correct, it will be locked in, and its category will be color-coded.

If incorrect, you lose a life.

You start with four lives.

Making four incorrect guesses ends the game.

Sometimes, the game provides a hint that you‚Äôre one word away from forming a correct group.

Use this to swap and refine your selections.

Correct groups are categorized as:Yellow: Easiest to guess.

Blue and Green: Moderate difficulty.

Purple: Hardest, often involving complex wordplay.

The game records your streaks and overall performance.

Challenge your friends or share results to see who solves the puzzles fastest.

If you run out of lives, the game ends.

Return the next day for a new puzzle and continue improving your skills!

Strategies for tackling NYT Connections puzzles

Identify Obvious Groups: Start with the most apparent connections, like mythology or objects with specific features.

Use Process of Elimination: Cross off words as you place them into groups, narrowing the possibilities for the remaining categories.

Think Creatively: Some categories require outside-the-box thinking, like interpreting word segments or understanding cultural references.

Learn from Mistakes: Each incorrect guess provides clues. Use these to refine your approach for future puzzles.

Other NYT games to sharpen your skills

NYT Mini Crossword: A quick yet challenging crossword experience.

Spelling Bee: Build as many words as possible using a set of seven letters.

Wordle: Solve a five-letter word puzzle with limited guesses.

Strands: A unique 6x8 word search that uses zig-zag solutions.

The New York Times has carved out a niche in digital word puzzles with games like Connections, a daily brain teaser designed to challenge logic and language skills. The April 4 puzzle (#663) brought its fair share of challenges, requiring players to think critically to identify connections between seemingly unrelated words. Known for its clever wordplay and nuanced categories, the game continues to captivate enthusiasts. This article delves into the intricacies of the puzzle, offering hints, solutions, and insights to help players master this engaging game and improve their problem-solving abilities.Connections is a daily word puzzle from The New York Times designed to test your vocabulary and expand your word knowledge. With three difficulty levels‚ÄîEasy, Medium, and Hard‚Äîit offers a fun and engaging way to challenge your brain while boosting your language skills. Word enthusiasts are sure to enjoy this delightful gaming experience. Currently, NYT Connections is trending across social media platforms!The Connections puzzle tests players' ability to group words into thematic categories. Unlike traditional crosswords, this game requires pattern recognition, linguistic knowledge, and a touch of creativity. Each puzzle includes 16 words, which must be sorted into four groups of four, based on shared characteristics.The March 24 edition is particularly tricky, featuring themes that ranged from verbs to Greek mythology, requiring careful analysis and lateral thinking. With varying levels of difficulty across the categories, this puzzle is a treat for seasoned solvers and a challenge for newcomers.If you‚Äôve struggled with today‚Äôs puzzle or want to understand its nuances better, this article provides all the guidance you need‚Äîfrom subtle hints to full explanations.To assist players without revealing answers outright that you can use to start each category. Here are hints for the puzzle‚Äôs categories:These hints are designed to nudge players in the right direction without giving away the solution outright, preserving the thrill of solving the puzzle independently.For those who need a helping hand, here are the full solutions for today‚Äôs puzzle, along with detailed explanations:Understand the Objective:Access the Puzzle:Begin Sorting Words:Submit Your Groups:Interpret Feedback:Handle Lives and Mistakes:Watch for Hints:Color-Coded Groups:Track Progress and Compete:Game Over and Retry:Solving Connections puzzles can be daunting, but with the right approach, you can improve your skills:If you enjoy Connections, the New York Times offers several other puzzles to test your vocabulary and problem-solving skills:Each game offers a distinct challenge, allowing players to explore new ways to engage with language and logic.
Article Summary: Connections is a daily word puzzle from the new york times designed to test your vocabulary and expand your word knowledge. The april 4 puzzle (#663) brought its fair share of challenges, requiring players to think critically to identify connections between seemingly unrelated words.

Article Title: Facebook founder Mark Zuckerberg's $23 million DC mansion is the third-most expensive house buy in Donald Trump's Home State
Article Text:
Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg

Meta confirms: ‚ÄòMark and Priscilla have purchased a home in DC‚Ä¶‚Äô

Jeff Bezos, former Google CEO and other tech moguls who have brought houses in Washington

Jeff Bezos purchased a $23 million Kalorama mansion in 2016.

Peter Thiel bought a $13 million beaux-arts residence in 2021.

Similarly, former Google CEO Eric Schmidt acquired a $15 million Georgetown home once occupied by Jacqueline Kennedy.

PayPal co-founder David Sacks, now a White House advisor, purchased a $10.3 million Northwest DC penthouse.

Former eBay executive Jeff Skoll spent $17 million on Virginia properties reportedly planned for a compound.

Mark Zuckerberg has become the latest tech billionaire to establish a presence in Washington DC, purchasing a $23 million mansion in the upscale Woodland Normanstone neighborhood, a report has said. The acquisition, confirmed by Facebook parent company Meta, represents the third-most expensive residential sale in the city's history.Politico reports that for weeks, the identity of the buyer remained shrouded in mystery as real estate agents were bound by non-disclosure agreements. Shortly after the cash transaction closed in early March, images of the 15,000-square-foot property became pixelated on Google Maps, the report added.Neighborhood residents noted increased activity at the previously vacant home, coinciding with reports that Zuckerberg‚Äôs private jet had landed at Dulles Airport.The publication says that a Meta spokesperson confirmed the purchase, explaining: ‚ÄúMark and Priscilla have purchased a home in DC, which will allow Mark to spend more time there as Meta continues the work on policy issues related to American technology leadership.‚ÄùThe official explanation cites convenience and safety during increased Washington visits. Notably, Zuckerberg also has properties in Palo Alto, Lake Tahoe and Hawaii, among other places.Although tech titans have acquired Washington properties even before Trump's return to office, the pace has reportedly accelerated significantly in the past year.
Article Summary: The acquisition, confirmed by facebook parent company meta, represents the third-most expensive residential sale in the city's history. Shortly after the cash transaction closed in early march, images of the 15,000-square-foot property became pixelated on google maps.

Article Title: How to create Ghibli style images and animated videos? Check easy steps using ChatGPT and other AI models
Article Text:
How to create Ghibli style images and animated videos

Poll Which AI tool do you prefer for creating animated videos? Not sure Other AI models ChatGPT

Create Ghibli-style images using ChatGPT

Open the ChatGPT website or mobile app and log in to your account.

Ensure you have access to the image generation feature (currently available in GPT-4o for premium users).

If you have an existing image you want to transform, upload it using the image tool.

Type a prompt instructing ChatGPT to generate an image in the Studio Ghibli style. Example prompts: ‚ÄúCreate a Ghibli-style image of a peaceful countryside with cherry blossoms.‚Äù ‚ÄúTransform this photo into a Studio Ghibli-style animation frame.‚Äù

Wait a few seconds for the AI to process the request and render the image.

If the image does not match expectations, modify the prompt or use the editing feature to refine details.

Create Ghibli-style images using Grok 3

Access Grok via the X app or website and navigate to the chatbot interface.

Ensure you are using Grok 3, as it supports advanced AI image generation.

Similar to ChatGPT, users can either upload an image or describe the scene they want to create.

Use a detailed prompt: Example: ‚ÄúGenerate a Ghibli-style image of a cozy village under the moonlight.‚Äù

Review the generated artwork and adjust it as needed for accuracy.

Create Ghibli style images using Google‚Äôs Gemini

Open the Gemini AI tool via Google‚Äôs chatbot interface or mobile app.

Ensure that Gemini‚Äôs image generation feature is activated.

Provide a detailed prompt: Example: ‚ÄúDraw a Ghibli-inspired forest with floating lanterns and a serene lake.‚Äù

Use additional AI refinements to adjust colors, textures, and details.

How to create Ghibli-style animated videos

Step 1: Create a Ghibli-style image

Use an AI tool ‚Äì Enter a simple description, like ‚Äúa peaceful Ghibli-style village at sunset, with warm colors and glowing lanterns‚Äù, and the tool will generate an image for you.

‚Äì Enter a simple description, like ‚Äúa peaceful Ghibli-style village at sunset, with warm colors and glowing lanterns‚Äù, and the tool will generate an image for you. Draw your own art ‚Äì If you enjoy sketching, you can create your own Ghibli-style scene using a drawing app or by hand.

‚Äì If you enjoy sketching, you can create your own Ghibli-style scene using a drawing app or by hand. Edit a photo ‚Äì Take a regular photo and use an editing app to give it a soft, painted effect with warm colors.

Step 2: Prepare the image for animation

Background (sky, buildings, mountains) ‚Äì This stays still.

‚Äì This stays still. Midground (trees, water, small objects) ‚Äì This can move slightly.

‚Äì This can move slightly. Foreground (characters, leaves, floating lanterns) ‚Äì These should have the most movement.

Step 3: Plan your animation

A character‚Äôs hair swaying in the wind.

A leaf slowly falling from a tree.

Soft clouds moving in the background.

A gentle camera zoom to add depth.

Step 4: Animate your image

Move each layer slowly ‚Äì Shift the background slightly, make trees sway, or let a character‚Äôs dress flutter.

‚Äì Shift the background slightly, make trees sway, or let a character‚Äôs dress flutter. Add small effects ‚Äì You can make tiny glowing lights appear, or add soft movements like rippling water.

‚Äì You can make tiny glowing lights appear, or add soft movements like rippling water. Use slow and natural motion ‚Äì Ghibli animation is all about subtle, gentle movements, so avoid making things too fast or dramatic.

Step 5: Add sound and music

Soft background music ‚Äì A calm melody can set the mood.

‚Äì A calm melody can set the mood. Nature sounds ‚Äì Birds chirping, wind blowing, or water flowing can make it feel real.

‚Äì Birds chirping, wind blowing, or water flowing can make it feel real. Character sounds (optional) ‚Äì If you have a character, you can add light footsteps or soft laughter.

Step 6: Save and share your Ghibli-style animation

Save it in a video format so it can be shared easily.

Check how it looks‚Äîif any movement seems too fast, slow it down for a more dreamy effect.

Post it on social media and enjoy the reactions!

Requirements to create Studio Ghibli-style images using AI

1. Access to an AI image generation tool

ChatGPT (GPT-4o with Image Generation) ‚Äì Available to premium subscribers.

‚Äì Available to premium subscribers. xAI‚Äôs Grok 3 ‚Äì Integrated with X (formerly Twitter).

‚Äì Integrated with X (formerly Twitter). Google Gemini AI ‚Äì Can generate artistic images using text prompts.

‚Äì Can generate artistic images using text prompts. MidJourney ‚Äì Offers advanced style customization for anime-inspired images.

‚Äì Offers advanced style customization for anime-inspired images. Stable Diffusion (DreamBooth, ControlNet, or SDXL models) ‚Äì Can be trained on specific styles.

‚Äì Can be trained on specific styles. DALL¬∑E 3 (by OpenAI) ‚Äì Provides high-quality AI-generated images with editing features.

Requirement

2. A strong and detailed text prompt

Example prompt:

"Generate a Studio Ghibli-style image of a young girl in a flowing dress standing in a sunlit meadow, surrounded by lush green hills and soft pastel clouds. The atmosphere should be warm and dreamy, with hand-drawn textures and soft lighting. The colors should be rich yet muted, creating a nostalgic, whimsical feel."

Specify art style ‚Äì Mention "Studio Ghibli" explicitly.

‚Äì Mention "Studio Ghibli" explicitly. Include scene elements ‚Äì Describe characters, setting, lighting, and mood.

‚Äì Describe characters, setting, lighting, and mood. Use emotion and atmosphere ‚Äì E.g., ‚Äúnostalgic,‚Äù ‚Äúdreamlike,‚Äù ‚Äúwarm and serene.‚Äù

3. A reference image (optional)

Transform a real-life photo into an anime-style painting.

Convert a personal sketch into a Ghibli-like illustration.

Requirement

4. Knowledge of Ghibli‚Äôs artistic style

Hand-drawn look ‚Äì Soft, organic linework.

Rich colour palettes ‚Äì Pastel shades, warm lighting, and natural tones.

Dreamlike atmosphere ‚Äì Fantasy elements blended with real-life settings.

Detailed backgrounds ‚Äì Intricate nature scenes, floating lanterns, rolling hills.

A computer, tablet, or smartphone with internet access.

A web browser to access online AI tools.

Sufficient processing power if running AI locally (for Stable Diffusion).

6. Image editing software (optional)

Photoshop or GIMP ‚Äì For manual touch-ups.

Canva ‚Äì For easy enhancements.

AI Image Upscalers ‚Äì Improve resolution and quality.

7. Ethical and copyright considerations

Avoid using copyrighted characters or artwork directly.

Ensure AI-generated work is transformative and original.

Why is Ghibli-style AI art trending

Nostalgia factor : Studio Ghibli films have a strong emotional connection with audiences worldwide.

: Studio Ghibli films have a strong emotional connection with audiences worldwide. Aesthetic appeal : The soft colors, dreamy landscapes, and intricate details make Ghibli-style visuals highly appealing.

: The soft colors, dreamy landscapes, and intricate details make Ghibli-style visuals highly appealing. Ease of AI tools: AI platforms have simplified the creation process, making it accessible to non-artists.

The use of artificial intelligence (AI) to generate artistic images and animations has gained widespread attention, with Studio Ghibli-style creations becoming a major trend. AI-powered tools like OpenAI‚Äôs ChatGPT, xAI‚Äôs Grok 3, and Google‚Äôs Gemini have introduced image generation capabilities that allow users to create visuals resembling the iconic hand-drawn aesthetic of Studio Ghibli films.Studio Ghibli, a renowned Japanese animation studio founded by Hayao Miyazaki , Isao Takahata, and Toshio Suzuki, is famous for its richly detailed backgrounds, soft color palettes, and fluid animations. AI-based image generators have now made it possible for users to recreate this distinctive style with minimal effort.Here‚Äôs a step-by-step guide on how to generate Studio Ghibli-style images and animated videos using ChatGPT, Grok 3, and Gemini. It also explores the growing trend of AI-generated Ghibli content, the technology behind these tools, and the potential challenges regarding copyright and artistic integrity.OpenAI's ChatGPT, powered by GPT-4o, includes an AI image generator that enables users to create visually appealing images. While this feature is primarily available to paid subscribers, users with access can generate Studio Ghibli-style artwork by following these steps:xAI‚Äôs Grok 3, integrated into X (formerly Twitter), also allows for AI-generated images with customizable artistic styles. Users can leverage Grok 3 for Ghibli-style artwork by following these steps:Google‚Äôs Gemini AI has been steadily improving its generative capabilities, particularly in image creation. Users can generate Studio Ghibli-style images with Gemini AI using these steps:To start, you need a beautiful Ghibli-style picture. You can do this in three ways:Once your image is ready, you can animate it to make it look alive!To make different parts of the image move, you need to separate objects into layers.You can either create these layers while drawing or cut out different parts of an existing image and save them separately.Before animating, decide what small movements you want. Here are some easy ideas:Keeping movements simple will help maintain the calm, magical feeling of a Ghibli-style scene.Now, it‚Äôs time to bring your picture to life!To make your animation even more magical, you can add:Once your animation is ready:Creating Studio Ghibli-style images using AI requires a combination of the right tools, detailed prompts, and an understanding of the aesthetic elements that define Ghibli‚Äôs signature style. Below are the key requirements needed to generate high-quality Ghibli-style AI images.To create Ghibli-style images, you need an AI tool capable of generating or modifying images based on text prompts. The most commonly used AI platforms include:: A registered account on the respective AI platform, and in some cases, a paid subscription to unlock advanced image generation features.AI models rely on textual descriptions to generate images. To create Studio Ghibli-style artwork, your prompt should be highly detailed and include elements that define the Ghibli aesthetic.Tips for a good prompt:Some AI tools allow users to upload an existing image to modify it in the Ghibli style. This can be helpful if you want to:: The AI tool must support image input (e.g., DALL¬∑E 3, Grok 3, Stable Diffusion).Understanding Studio Ghibli‚Äôs signature elements will help in crafting better AI prompts:5. A device with internet accessAI image generators are typically cloud-based, meaning you‚Äôll need:To refine the AI-generated image, you might need an image editor:While AI allows easy creation of Ghibli-style images, it's important to:The rise of AI-generated Ghibli-style images and videos has been fueled by social media, where users showcase their creations. OpenAI CEO Sam Altman even changed his profile picture to a Ghibli-style image, further popularizing the trend.Reasons for the popularity of Ghibli-style AI art:
Article Summary: How to create ghibli-style images and animated videos using ai tools. Chatgpt, grok 3 and gemini are among the most popular tools. Use the instructions below to help you create your own animated videos. Artificial intelligence (ai) to generate artistic images and animations has gained widespread attention.

Article Title: Today's Wordle hints and answer: Check clues to solve Wordle #1384 on April 3
Article Text:
Wordle today‚Äôs hints, clues, and answer

Wordle Answer Today

:

Wordle hints and answers today

Poll How often do you play Wordle? Never Occasionally A few times a week Daily

Wordle hints and clues for April 3,

The word starts with the letter 'S'.

It contains two vowels.

The word ends with letter 'R'.

The word has no repeating letter.

Today's Wordle means to remove by cutting or clipping.

Wordle, April 3, 2025: Word of the day

Today's Wordle word is ‚ÄòSHEAR‚Äô.

How did Wordle originate

Where can you play Wordle





How to play Wordle

Wordle FAQs

Can I play past Wordle puzzles?

No, Wordle is designed as a daily game with a unique puzzle each day. While you can‚Äôt play past puzzles on the official site, there are unofficial Wordle archives available where you can play previous games.

How do the color-coded tiles work in Wordle?

Green means the letter is correct and in the correct position.

Yellow means the letter is correct but in the wrong position.

Gray means the letter is not in the word at all.

How many guesses do I get in Wordle?

You have six chances to guess the correct five-letter word. After each guess, you receive feedback to help guide your next attempt.

Can I play Wordle more than once per day?

Wordle is designed as a daily puzzle, so you can only play one puzzle per day. The word of the day is the same for everyone globally, and once you complete it, you‚Äôll have to wait until the next day for a new puzzle.

Can letters repeat in Wordle?

Yes, repeated letters can appear in Wordle answers. Words containing duplicate letters can present more of a challenge when solving.

Is Wordle available in other languages?

Yes, there are multiple versions of Wordle available in various languages, including Spanish, French, and German. You can switch to a different language by finding the corresponding version of the game online.

Wordle is a popular word puzzle game that challenges players to guess a five-letter word within six attempts. Developed by Josh Wardle, this simple yet addictive game has taken the world by storm with its easy-to-understand rules and daily challenges. Each guess provides feedback with colored tiles: green indicates the correct letter in the correct spot, yellow signals the correct letter in the wrong spot, and gray means the letter isn't in the word. Wordle‚Äôs mix of logic and vocabulary makes it a daily brain teaser loved by millions worldwide.The Wordle puzzle can be tricky to solve, which is likely why you‚Äôve found yourself here, struggling to crack today‚Äôs challenge. As always, today‚Äôs NYT Wordle was full of surprises, but don‚Äôt worry‚Äîwe‚Äôre here to help. Below, you‚Äôll find some helpful clues for today‚Äôs Wordle answer, and if those don‚Äôt do the trick, keep reading to discover the solution directly.Today‚Äôs Wordle promises a puzzle that tests your linguistic skills, likely to be decoded by many participants. To assist you in solving the puzzle, we've curated a fresh array of hints and clues for today's Wordle challenge.Whether you have cracked the code or are still working with the hints, it is now time to reveal the answer. Drumroll please, as we unveil the answer for Wordle.Wordle was initially developed by engineer Josh Wardle as a thoughtful gift for his partner. However, it quickly gained massive popularity, turning into a global sensation with thousands of players engaging daily. The game's success inspired fans to create various spin-offs, such as the battle royale-style Squabble, the music identification game Heardle, and multi-word challenges like Dordle and Quordle.As its popularity soared, The New York Times acquired Wordle, and it became a hit on social media platforms like TikTok, where creators even livestream their gameplay sessions.Wordle isn't available as an app; it can only be played through a web browser. To play, simply visit the New York Times Games website.Originally hosted on its own site and created by Josh Wardle, Wordle was acquired by the New York Times in February of this year. One of the great aspects of Wordle is that it‚Äôs ad-free, allowing you to fully concentrate on the word-guessing game.To play Wordle, visit the link https://www.nytimes.com/games/wordle/index.html and begin guessing words.
Article Summary: Wordle is a daily puzzle game that challenges players to guess a five-letter word within six attempts. The word of the day is the same for everyone globally, and once you complete it, you‚Äôll have to wait until the next day for a new puzzle. To assist you in solving the puzzle, we've curated a fresh array of hints and clues for today's challenge.

Article Title: How to play Minecraft April Fools 2025 Craftmine update
Article Text:
(Image Via Mojang Studios)

How to play Minecraft‚Äôs Craftmine update

How to begin crafting mine

Mojang Studios has unveiled the Craftmine update for Minecraft Java Edition as part of its 2025 April Fools' celebration. The update introduces the Mine Crafter, a unique feature that allows players to craft custom mines filled with distinct challenges and resources. While intended as a lighthearted addition, the update offers a fresh and engaging experience for Minecraft enthusiasts. Players can try The Craftmine Update by downloading the latest snapshot for Minecraft: Java Edition. To access the snapshot, users need to open the Minecraft Launcher on their device and navigate to the Installations tab. From there, you can take Snapshots and select the Latest Snapshot. Once selected, launch the game and explore the new features.Additionally, players can experience this snapshot on their Java Realms, allowing them to enjoy the update with friends. Mojang advises players to back up their worlds before testing the Minecraft snapshot, as these updates have the potential to corrupt game data.To explore Minecraft‚Äôs April Fool‚Äôs Craftmine update, follow these steps:1. Open the Minecraft Launcher2. Navigate to the Installations Tab3. Enable Snapshots. Ensure that the "Snapshots" option is checked to access experimental versions.4. Create a New Installation. Click on "New Installation," name it (e.g., "Craftmine Update"), and select the version labeled "25w14craftmine."5. Launch the Game. After saving the new installation, select it and click "Play" to begin your Craftmine adventure.Upon entering the Craftmine world, you'll notice several changes:- Limited Inventory: Initially, only your hotbar is accessible; the rest of the inventory is locked.- No Default Crafting Grid: The standard 2x2 crafting grid in your inventory is unavailable.1. Locate the Crafter Block: This block is typically found at the spawn point and is essential for crafting in this update.2. Gather Resources: For example, collect wood from nearby trees.3. Use the Crafter:- Place the collected wood into the Crafter to produce wooden planks.- Arrange four wooden planks in a 2x2 pattern within the Crafter.- Activate the attached lever to craft a crafting table.This crafting table will enable you to create additional items necessary for your journey.As you progress, you can unlock more inventory slots and crafting capabilities:- Earn Experience Points (XP): Successfully navigating mines and collecting resources grants XP.- Unlock Upgrades: Use XP to access the "Player Unlocks" menu, where you can:- Expand your inventory space.- Gain access to the 3x3 crafting grid.- Enable additional crafting features.
Article Summary: Mojang studios has unveiled the craftmine update as part of its 2025 april fools' celebration. The update introduces the mine crafter, a unique feature that allows players to craft custom mines filled with distinct challenges and resources. Players can try the craftmine update by downloading the latest snapshot for minecraft: java edition.

Article Title: Dwight Howard‚Äôs $7 million WNBA fraud nightmare ends as conman gets 12 years
Article Text:
Dwight Howard. Image via: Rick Scuteri/ AP/ File

Calvin Darden Jr. gets 12 years for scamming Dwight Howard



Calvin Darden Jr. , a Georgia businessman with a long history of deception, has been sentenced to more than 12 years in federal prison for orchestrating two elaborate financial scams that defrauded former NBA stars Dwight Howard and Chandler Parsons out of a combined $8 million. The fraudster reportedly offered Howard a whopping $7 million WNBA franchise deal, but Darden Jr‚Äôs deception has come to an end as he was finally sentenced.The 50-year-old Calvin Darden Jr., who was previously convicted in two separate fraud cases, used fake investment pitches and forged documents to convince Dwight Howard and Chandler Parsons to invest in completely fictitious ventures. On April 4, U.S. District Judge Vernon S. Broderick handed down a 12 years and 7 months sentence.At the heart of the scheme was a phony opportunity Darden pitched to former NBA champion and eight-time All-Star, Howard. Darden lured Howard into handing over $7 million under the belief he was buying an ownership stake in the WNBA‚Äôs Atlanta Dream . He even name-dropped celebrities like Tyler Perry, Naomi Osaka, and Issa Rae as supposed advisors backing the deal ‚Äî none of whom had any involvement."In truth and in fact, those individuals and companies had never agreed to be advisors or corporate sponsors to the Dream and many had never even heard of Darden Jr.," prosecutors said in a statement (via PEOPLE).The Orlando Magic Hall of Famer testified during the trial, sharing how he only learned the truth when ESPN reported that the team had been sold to a separate ownership group involving former Dream player Renee Montgomery in 2021.Meanwhile, Darden duped Chandler Parsons, a former NBA forward, out of $1 million through a separate scheme involving then-prospect James Wiseman. Darden and his associate falsely claimed they were helping develop Wiseman‚Äôs career and forged documents indicating Wiseman had agreed to be represented by their partner, Charles Briscoe.In reality, prosecutors said, ‚ÄúDarden Jr. did not know Wiseman‚Äù and spent the money on ‚Äúwatches, a Mercedes, and other personal expenses.‚Äù Wiseman, now waived by the Toronto Raptors, was never involved in the deal.The stolen funds were funneled into Darden‚Äôs personal luxuries. He reportedly bought a $3.7 million mansion in Atlanta, a Lamborghini, a Rolls-Royce, and $600,000 worth of art by Jean-Michel Basquiat. Other purchases included a $110,000 piano, luxury watches worth $90,000, and home upgrades totaling over $500,000.In addition to his prison sentence, Darden was ordered to forfeit $8 million and return the luxury goods purchased with the stolen money.It was Darden‚Äôs third conviction for fraud. In 2015, he served time for impersonating his father, who was a respected UPS executive, in a failed bid to purchase Maxim magazine.‚ÄúCalvin Darden, Jr., stole millions of dollars from former NBA players and used the money to buy a mansion, a fleet of luxury cars, and expensive artwork,‚Äù said Acting U.S. Attorney Matthew Podolsky (per Sportico). ‚ÄúThis conviction‚Äîhis third‚Äîand sentence make clear that severe consequences await those who take advantage of others by fraud.‚ÄùAlso Read: "I'm truly appreciative": Dwight Howard shares heartfelt message ahead of final Hall of Fame announcement Darden did not appear in court for sentencing, claiming to have suffered a concussion in custody.
Article Summary: Calvin darden jr. has been sentenced to more than 12 years in federal prison. He defrauded former nba stars dwight howard and chandler parsons out of a combined $8 million. The fraudster reportedly offered howard a whopping $7 million wnba franchise deal.

Article Title: Satya Nadella shares when 3 Microsoft CEOs walk into a room on Microsoft‚Äôs 50th anniversary and get interviewed
Article Text:
Satya Nadella on when AI can ‚Äòrun the show‚Äô: ‚ÄòThe day AI can play like the best cricket player that‚Ä¶‚Äô

Satya Nadella thanks message for ex-Microsoft CEOs

Microsoft is now 50 years old. To celebrate the 50th anniversary, CEO Satya Nadella along with former CEOs Bill Gates and Steve Ballmer , sat for a conversation led by an unexpected host‚ÄîCopilot, the AI assistant developed by Microsoft. Sharing a video in an X post, Nadella wrote ‚ÄúThree Microsoft CEOs walk into a room on Microsoft‚Äôs 50th anniversary ‚Ä¶ and are interviewed by Copilot!‚ÄùThe conversation starts with Satya Nadella playfully prompting Copilot to ‚Äúwrap it up by asking or maybe roast giving us each an AI roast ?‚Äù.Copilot replied ‚ÄúAlright, Satya. Let's spice it up.‚ÄùTurning to Steve Ballmer first, the AI quipped, ‚ÄúSteve, we'll start with you. Your enthusiasm is legendary, but do you ever worry that your energy might short-circuit the AI? I mean, even robots need a coffee break after your pep talks.‚ÄùTo this, Ballmer responded, ‚ÄúCome on, dude. If you can‚Äôt handle me, you can‚Äôt handle a huge percentage of the world‚Äôs population. We‚Äôre counting on you.‚ÄùIn the 2-minute clip, Coploti asks: ‚ÄúSatya, AI seems to be your best buddy, but ever worry that your deep passion for AI could one day have it running the show, leaving you to just enjoy the ride?‚Äù. Nadella fired back with a grin, stating ‚ÄúWell, the day AI can play like the best cricket player that I enjoy, that‚Äôs the day it can run the show as far as I'm concerned.The AI assistant responds saying ‚ÄúTouche‚Äô Satya, Let‚Äôs see if it can hit a century in cricket, and then we'll talk. This has been a blast, gentlemen. Here's to another 50 years of innovation and adventure. Cheers!‚ÄùTurning to Bill Gates, Copilot asks if AI feels intimidated by his intense thinking face?. Gates responded ‚ÄúI hope so. I mean, that's all I've got left is these AIs get so damn intelligent. It's just that gaze and my willingness to criticize that differentiates me.‚ÄùThe AI assistant said, ‚ÄúAnd it's a formidable gaze indeed, Bill.‚Äù Steve said, ‚ÄúCopilot, would you ever be willing to criticise him?‚Äù‚ÄúAbsolutely. Criticism is where growth happens,‚Äù the AI quipped.In another X post, Nadella wrote ‚ÄúI'm eternally grateful to Bill and Steve and to Paul for what you've meant to me personally and the vision you had to build this extraordinary company of ours that I've had the privilege to be a part of.‚Äù‚ÄúThank You for your leadership, your passion, and for building the Microsoft that we know today. A company that has truly changed the world.‚Äù
Article Summary: Satya nadella on when ai can ‚Äòrun the show‚Äô: ‚Äòthe day ai can play like the best cricket player that i enjoy, that‚Äôs the day it can run the show as far as i'm concerned‚Äô

Article Title: Flipkart co-founder Sachin Bansal admits disagreements with Walmart over strategy, says my exit from Flipkart was ...
Article Text: Sachin Bansal acknowledged his dissatisfaction with leaving Flipkart after Walmart's acquisition, labeling it as 'unfinished business.' Bansal faced disagreements with Walmart's focus on short-term sales. He now channels his ambition into Navi, a financial services startup, still aiming to create a large-scale impactful platform.
Article Summary: Sachin bansal left flipkart after walmart's acquisition. Bansal faced disagreements with walmart's focus on short-term sales. He now channels his ambition into navi, a financial services startup, still aiming to create a large-scale impactful platform.

Article Title: As Wall Street bleeds tech CEO who saw billions wiped from his wealth in single day, and he is not Elon Musk
Article Text:
Wall Street bloodbath: How much Bezos, Musk and others lost

How tech companies‚Äô stocks lost value after Trump announced tariffs



Facebook-parent Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg saw the largest drop in net worth on April 3, losing a staggering $17.9 billion. As per Bloomberg Billionaire Index, Amazon founder Jeff Bezos, Apple CEO Tim Cook, Facebook founder Mark Zuckerberg, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang, Tesla CEO Elon Musk and several others from the world‚Äôs richest 500 list collectively lost $208 billion in market value. The sharp decline came after the US President Donald Trump announced a new wave of "discounted" reciprocal tariffs, triggering panic across financial markets. Wall Street recorded its worst trading day in years, as all major US stock indexes suffered their biggest single-day drops since the COVID-19 pandemic.As per Forbes data, Facebook-parent Meta‚Äôs Zuckerberg witnessed the highest drop in wealth, losing $17.9 billion on Thursday (April 3). Amazon founder Jeff Bezos, on the other hand, saw his wealth decline by a staggering $16 billion.Third most struck by the drop was Tesla CEO and Trump‚Äôs close aide Elon Musk who lost $8.7 billion amid the market selloff.Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang saw a decline of $7.4 billion in his net worth, whereas Microsoft founder Bill Gates‚Äò wealth declined by $774 million in a single day.Google-parent Alphabet co-founders Larry Page and Sergey Brin lost $4.9 billion and $4.6 billion, respectively. Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai witnessed a loss of $18 million.Apple CEO Tim Cook saw his net worth decline by $68 million.According to Reuters, about $760 billion in market capitalisation was lost by tech giants collectively. Apple led the sharp selloff, tumbling nearly 6% in after-hours trading. Nvidia shares fell around 4% amid worries over its Taiwan-based chip production and Mexico-assembled AI hardware.Tesla also took a hit, dropping 4.5% after hours. Other tech giants including Alphabet, Amazon, and Meta saw their stocks fall between 2.5% and 5%, while Microsoft proved slightly more resilient, slipping nearly 2%.
Article Summary: Facebook-parent meta ceo mark zuckerberg saw the largest drop in net worth on april 3, losing a staggering $17.9 billion. Amazon founder jeff bezos, apple ceo tim cook, facebook founder mark zuckerberg, nvidia ceo jensen huang, tesla ceo elon musk and several others from the world‚Äôs richest 500 list collectively lost $208 billion in market value.

Article Title: When LinkedIn co-founder told employees: Go home, have dinner with family, and then open laptops to ‚Ä¶
Article Text:
Poll Do you think work-life balance is possible in startup culture? No, startups need full commitment to grow Yes, balance is important for long-term success

LinkedIn co-founder says work-life balance is not for start-ups

LinkedIn co-founder Reid Hoffman has revealed that during the company's early days, employees were expected to continue working from home after having dinner with their families, according to recently resurfaced comments that highlight his controversial stance on work-life balance for startup employees."When we started LinkedIn, we started with people who had families. So we said, sure, go home have dinner with your family. Then, after dinner with your family, open up your laptop and get back in the shared work experience and keep working," Hoffman stated in a podcast appearance last year.The tech entrepreneur's approach to work schedules represents a glimpse into the demanding culture that helped build LinkedIn before Microsoft acquired it in 2016 for $26.2 billion.Hoffman maintains that a relentless work ethic is non-negotiable for startup success. "If I ever hear a founder talking about, 'this is how I have a balanced life'‚Äîthey're not committed to winning," Hoffman told Stanford University 's "How to Start a Startup" class in 2014.Despite growing conversations about workplace wellness since the pandemic, Hoffman's position remains unchanged. "Work-life balance is not the start-up game," he said on the Diary of a CEO podcast .The LinkedIn co-founder defends his perspective against critics, arguing that those who disagree fundamentally misunderstand startup realities. "The people that think that's toxic don't understand the start-up game, and they're just wrong," he said. "The game is intense. And by the way, if you don't do that, eventually, you're out of a job."Hoffman points to significant financial rewards for those who embrace the grind. According to him, approximately 100 early LinkedIn employees "don't need to work anymore" following the company's success
Article Summary: Linkedin co-founder reid hoffman has revealed that during the company's early days, employees were expected to continue working from home. Hoffman maintains that a relentless work ethic is non-negotiable for startup success. "work-life balance is not the start-up game," he said.

Article Title: UK invests ¬£20 million in flying taxis and drone services
Article Text:
Poll Do you think the UK will become a global leader in aviation technology by 2028? No, it's too ambitious Yes, it's possible

The UK government has committed ¬£20 million ($25.8 million) to support commercial drone services and the development of "flying taxis." The initiative aims to advance new technologies and streamline regulations, potentially allowing air taxis to operate by 2028.The transport ministry announced that ¬£16.5 million will be allocated to the Civil Aviation Authority from 2025-26 to establish regulations for drones and electric air taxis. An additional ¬£5 million will support businesses in developing profitable ventures using these technologies. Transport officials say the funding will enhance emergency services, with drones assisting firefighters and paramedics.While the UK has seen drone trials, including postal deliveries in the Scottish isles and medical transport in London, commercial adoption has been slow. Amazon selected Darlington for its first UK drone delivery service, but a launch date remains uncertain.Critics warn of potential job losses and privacy risks associated with aerial surveillance. Authorities are also concerned about drones being used for smuggling contraband into prisons.Technology Secretary Peter Kyle emphasized the need for a regulatory system that adapts to innovation, ensuring safety and efficiency. Aviation Minister Mike Kane reiterated the goal of making the UK a global leader in aviation technology.Despite concerns, the UK continues integrating automation into its transport ecosystem, with self-driving delivery robots already operating in Milton Keynes.
Article Summary: The uk government has committed $25.8 million to support commercial drone services and the development of "flying taxis" the initiative aims to advance new technologies and streamline regulations, potentially allowing air taxis to operate by 2028. Critics warn of potential job losses and privacy risks associated with aerial surveillance.

Article Title: Elon Musk: What did Elon Musk's DOGE do to Deloitte? 124 contracts worth more than $370 million slashed
Article Text:
What did Elon Musk's DOGE do to Deloitte? 127 contracts worth $1.16 billion slashed

Deloitte has been hit hardest by the Trump administration‚Äôs consulting cuts , with at least 124 of its federal contracts eliminated or modified since January, Fortune reported.The cuts, led by Elon Musk ‚Äôs department of government efficiency ( DOGE ), aim to reduce government spending and have resulted in an estimated $371.8 million in taxpayer savings .According to Fortune, DOGE has cut or modified at least 124 Deloitte contracts since the start of Trump‚Äôs second term. These contracts were worth a total of over $1.16 billion, with terminations done worth over $371.8 million. The largest cancelled contract, valued at $51 million, was for IT services for the department of health and human services. Deloitte has faced more contract eliminations than any other consultancy, with Booz Allen Hamilton and Accenture trailing behind.DOGE claims to have saved $140 billion overall, but Bank of America has raised concerns over exaggerated savings, as some listed contract terminations predate Trump‚Äôs tenure or ended naturally, reported The New York Times.The cuts have impacted the private sector, as federal contracts are a major source of revenue for consulting firms. Accenture‚Äôs CEO Julie Sweet acknowledged in an earnings call that the reductions have hurt the firm‚Äôs revenue, with its Federal Services division losing $240.2 million in contracts. Following her remarks, Accenture‚Äôs stock dropped by more than 7%.The General Services Administration (GSA) has asked consultancies to submit detailed reports identifying cost-cutting opportunities. ‚ÄúThis Administration is firmly of the view that America‚Äôs private industry is our backbone‚Ä¶ but that‚Äôs not inconsistent with right-sizing spending,‚Äù said GSA‚Äôs Josh Gruenbaum, according to Fortune.While DOGE‚Äôs actions have largely spared the defense sector, companies like Booz Allen Hamilton, which rely heavily on Pentagon contracts, remain at risk. Analysts warn that prolonged cuts could impact innovation and economic growth, with firms taking a cautious ‚Äúwait-and-see‚Äù approach.
Article Summary: Elon musk's department of government efficiency ( doge) has cut or modified at least 124 deloitte contracts since the start of trump's second term. The contracts were worth a total of over $1.16 billion, with terminations done worth over $371.8 million. The largest cancelled contract was for it services for the department of health and human services.

Article Title: Infra.Market eyes $1bn IPO, $5bn valuation
Article Text: MUMBAI: Tiger Global backed Infra.Market is planning to raise $1 billion through an IPO at a valuation of up to $5 billion, sources close to the development said. The startup, which was last valued at $2.8 billion, is targeting a Diwali listing and will file its draft IPO papers by June. The bulk of the offer will include fresh issue of shares."The company's IPO plans are on track and the current trajectory of the markets is not holding them back. Unless there is a delay in the IPO approval process, things should progress as planned. The firm is looking at a valuation in the range of $3-5 billion even though bankers want to set it at the upper end of the band," a source told TOI. Infra.Market declined to comment.Tiger Global is the biggest external investor in the company with a 21.3% shareholding followed by Accel with a 16.9% stake. Promoters Aaditya Sharda and Souvik Sengupta collectively have a shareholding of 31.7%. Founded in 2016, the Mumbai-based unicorn startup operates in the B2B space and is among a handful of new age companies making profits.
Article Summary: Infra.market is planning to raise $1 billion through an ipo at a valuation of up to $5 billion. The startup, which was last valued at $2.8 billion, is targeting a diwali listing. Tiger global is the biggest external investor in the company with a 21.3% shareholding.

Article Title: Trump tariffs: Stocked-up Apple buys time, may not pass on duties soon
Article Text: New Delhi: Apple does not intend to make any immediate changes to retail prices of its products, such as iPhone, including in India, following the Trump administration's imposition of reciprocal tariffs as the company had sent "unusually high" number of shipments from factories in India and China to build up stocks in America, despite this being a "relatively lean period", sources told TOI.Apple's warehouses in the US remain "sufficiently stocked up for the next few months", with products shipped from key manufacturing locations at a "frenetic pace" to beat the start of the higher tax regime, that begins with a baseline 10% tariff from April 5 and then with addition of respective reciprocal tariffs (different for each country) from April 9."Factories in India and China and other key locations had been shipping products to the US in anticipation of the higher tariffs coming into play. The reserves that arrived at lower duty will temporarily insulate the company from the higher prices that it will need to pay for the new shipments that start coming under the revised tax rates," one source said.The US is one of the biggest markets for sales of iPhones and other products of Apple and there are fears that if the company passes off entire duty burden on customers, there will be a slowdown in demand and reduction in the company's margins."Any price hike to offset this impact cannot be limited to just the US market, but will have to be taken across key global regions, including India. Such a step can only be taken once the company makes a full assessment of the supply chain and manufacturing locations, the stipulated tariffs for those countries, and how to balance the production from various regions to provide a cushion to shipments into the high-tax US market," the source said.
Article Summary: Apple does not intend to make any immediate changes to retail prices of its products, such as iphone, including in india. The company had sent "unusually high" number of shipments from factories in india and china to build up stocks in america, despite this being a "relatively lean period"

Article Title: IndusInd loan book shrinks by 5% in Q4
Article Text: MUMBAI: IndusInd Bank reported a slight year-on-year rise in net advances and deposits for the quarter ended March 2025, even as sequential trends reflected a slowdown in loan growth.The bank's net advances stood at Rs. 3.48 lakh crore as of March 31, 2025, up 1.4% from a year ago but down 5.2% from the preceding quarter. The drop in corporate loans comes amid reports that the private lender has raised money by offering its corporate loans to other banks.Within this, corporate banking saw a 4.9% year-on-year decline and a sharper 15.1% fall on a sequential basis. The consumer business, by contrast, rose 6.3% year-on-year and 3.4% quarter-on-quarter. Total deposits increased 6.8% year-on-year to Rs. 4.11 lakh crore, registering a modest 0.4% growth from the Dec quarter. Retail deposits and those from small business customers dropped slightly to Rs. 1.85 lakh crore, from Rs. 1.89 lakh crore at the end of Dec 2024.
Article Summary: The bank's net advances stood at rs. 3.48 lakh crore as of march 31, 2025. Total deposits increased 6.8% year-on-year to rs. 4.11 lakh crore. Retail deposits and those from small business customers dropped slightly.

Article Title: Tech entrepreneurs hit back at Goyal's remark on startups
Article Text:
File photo - Piyush Goyal

In response to Union commerce minister Piyush Goyal 's jibe about Indian startups focusing on food delivery and quick commerce instead of deep-tech innovation , and drawing comparisons with China's progress, Zepto's co-founder and CEO Aadit Palicha offered a strong rebuttal. He staunchly defended the quick commerce sector, citing Zepto's impact - creating 1.5 lakh jobs, paying over Rs 1,000 crore in taxes, and drawing more than $1 billion in FDI."It is easy to criticise consumer internet startups in India, especially when you compare them to the deep technical excellence being built in the US/China," Palicha wrote on X.Goyal had sharply criticised the sector, urging startups to shift focus from "delivery boys and girls" to high-tech fields like semiconductors, robotics, and AI. "Do we want to make ice cream or chips? Dukaandari hi karna hai?" he asked.At the same Startup Mahakumbh event in New Delhi, G20 Sherpa Amitabh Kant warned against India becoming a "technological colony" and stressed the need to invest in innovation to protect sovereignty.BharatPe founder Ashneer Grover said netas need a reality check. "China also had food delivery first and then evolved to deep tech... maybe time for politicians to aspire for 10%+ economic growth rate for 20 years before chiding today's job creators," he wrote on X. "Maybe it's time to change 'public discourse' from history to science!"Former Infosys CFO TV Mohandas Pai also hit back, asking Goyal what he had done to grow deep-tech startups. "There are many startups in chip design, robotics, EV charging, etc., but where is the capital?" he asked. "Long-term investors still don't invest despite your efforts... AIF flow is down, RBI harasses foreign investors, and PSU-run buses won't buy even when we have the technology."
Article Summary: Union commerce minister piyush goyal had sharply criticised the sector. He urged startups to shift focus from "delivery boys and girls" to high-tech fields like semiconductors, robotics, and ai. Zepto's co-founder and ceo aadit palicha offered a strong rebuttal.
